<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3073</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History-Biblical Times</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte-Biblische Zeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Périodes Histoire-Bibliques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Épocas History-History-Biblical</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periodi Storia-Biblici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία-βιβλικός χρόνοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Épocas Historia-Bi'blicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This page describes the History of the Jewish people in Biblical times, from the Patriarchs until The exile to Babylonia, which followed the destruction of the First Temple (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biblical times</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">patriarchs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">first temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Seite beschreibt die Geschichte der 
jüdischen Leute in den biblischen Zeiten, von den Patriarchs bis das 
Exil zu Babylonia, das der Zerstörung des ersten Bügels (586 BCE) 
folgte,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page décrit l'histoire des personnes juives
dans des périodes bibliques, des patriarches jusqu'à l'exil à 
Babylonia, qui a suivi la destruction du premier temple (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta página descreve o history dos povos jewish 
em épocas biblical, dos patriarchs até o exile a Babylonia, que 
seguiu a destruição do primeiro temple (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa pagina descrive la storia della gente ebrea
nei periodi biblici, dai patriarchs fino al exile a Babylonia, che ha 
seguito la distruzione del primo tempiale (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σελίδα περιγράφει την ιστορία των εβραϊκών 
ανθρώπων στους βιβλικούς χρόνους, από τους πατριάρχες μέχρι τον 
εξόριστο σε Babylonia, που ακολούθησε την καταστροφή του πρώτου
ναού (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta paginación describe la historia de la gente 
judía en épocas bíblicas, de los patriarcas hasta el exilio a 
Babylonia, que siguió la destrucción del primer templo (586 BCE),</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biblische Zeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Patriarchs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erster Bügel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">périodes bibliques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">patriarches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">premier temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Babylone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">épocas biblical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">patriarchs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">primeiro temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">periodi biblici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">patriarchs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">primo tempiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλικοί χρόνοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πατριάρχες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρώτος ναός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">épocas bíblicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">patriarcas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">primer templo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
